name: Less than unanimous verdict authorized Impaneling, Segregation of Jury
text:
Less than unanimous verdict authorized.  In all civil cases tried before a jury it shall be sufficient for the return of a verdict if at least five-sixths of the jurors agree on the verdict. [L 1965, c 171, §1; Supp, §231-28; HRS ]
Cross References
  Trial by jury, see Const. Art. I, §13.
Rules of Court
  See HRCP rule 48.
